episodes.title: International Cult Awareness Day: Reflections From Cult Intervention Specialist Pat Ryan
episodes.description:
November 18th is International Cult Awareness Day and the 45th Anniversary of the Jonestown Massacre.

*Please note, in this interview, we discuss difficult topics such as su*cide, kidnapping, and s*xual assault. Please take care and visit https://www.cultawarenessday.com/ if you need resources.

Learn more about the purpose of this day, our goals, and reflections from Cult Intervention Specialist, Pat Ryan, about the day's broader impact on the cult recovery field. 

Create your own content for Cult Awareness Day! Use #cultawarenessday or message @peopleleavecults directly to be featured on our social media channels.

Are you a cult survivor seeking resources? Or, a family member with a loved one in a concerning group? Contact People Leave Cults to see what we can do to help: https://www.peopleleavecults.com/
